scripts.test-example: cd example && npm install && npm run test
scripts.test-test-init: cd test/init && npm install && npm test
scripts.test: npm run test-example && npm run test-test-init
scripts.clean: npm run clean-example && npm run clean-test-init
scripts.build: purs compile src/**/*.purs bower_components/*/src/**/*.purs && purs bundle --main Main --output bin/alchelmy.js output/**/*.js
